title: Sampler, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: satin, cross, double running, eyelet and surface stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Cross borders showing floral ornament and dogs.  Also an alphabet.
